meanings.definition: To raise or lift incorrectly or inappropriately.
meanings.sent1: She misraises her hand when answering questions in class.
meanings.sent2: He often misraises heavy boxes, causing strain on his back.
meanings.sent3: The robot misraises the cup and spills water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The magician misraises the curtain to reveal a surprise trick.
meanings.sent5: The toddler misraises the toy above his head, giggling happily.

meanings.definition: To increase the amount of a bet or wager in a poker game.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he misraises his bet, hoping to bluff his opponents.
meanings.sent2: She misraises the stakes, making the poker game more intense.
meanings.sent3: The player misraises his bet, trying to intimidate the others with his confidence.
meanings.sent4: His misraise makes the other players wonder about his hand.
meanings.sent5: The misraise causes a stir at the poker table, with everyone watching closely.
